Sister restaurant to Cera 23 - I really loved my dinner here.  We were a group of 5 and all shared a variety of plates.  Actually, Injae K has the details - go check out his review... by reading his review, I was able to relive the memories.  Now I'm hungry again.  And yes, at 30 Euros each - the meal was totally affordable considering how much we ordered (and drank).  My personal favorite was the duck paella.  Great service, too.
